response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $800,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality, innovation, and exclusivity. We believe it could be a significant asset to your collection or business. Considering its unique attributes, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this extraordinary opportunity.", "product_price": 800000}
